mods.abstract: Water, water everywhere- and all of it fit to drink! This is a peek at the filtering plant of the East Jefferson Waterworks where Mississippi River water is purified and propelled through underground pipelines under high pressure into the homes of 6,700 East Jefferson families.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.accessCondition: Copyright of federal and state documents is in the public domain.
